snippet: For young people and children with disabilities, the New York Rangers youth sled hockey team gives them an opportunity to be an athlete just like anyone else.
abstract: For young people and children with disabilities, the New York Rangers youth sled hockey team gives them an opportunity to be an athlete just like anyone else.

headline.main: For Young Disabled Athletes, a Chance to Glide, and Compete, on the Ice
headline.print_headline: Young and Disabled, and Scoring Goals Just Like the Pros
